page.title: 03EGERTONS OF TATTON
page.content: THE EGERTONS OF TATTON WERE NOT MEN OF AFFAIRS APART FROM THE FIRST OF THEIR LINE, SIR THOMAS EGERTON WHO WAS LORD CHANCELLOR TO QUEEN ELIZABETH 1 LATER EGERTONS SERVED AS MPS BUT THEIR SPHERE OF INFLUENCE WAS AT LOCAL AND COUNTY LEVEL, FINANCING SCHOOLS, CHARITIES AND SUPPORTING THE YEOMANRY. LORD EGERTON WAS CHAIRMAN OF THE MANCHESTER SHIP CANAL COMPANY IN I887 THE SPADE WITH WHICH HE CUT THE FIRST SOD IS ON SHOW AT THE HALL. THE FAMILY'S INFLUENCE CAN BE SEEN IN THE GARDENS. MAURICE EGERTON SPENT MUCH TIME ABROAD AND HOUSED HIS COLLECTION OF HUNTING TROPHIES IN THE TENANTS HALL. ALSO ON DISPLAY IS HIS BENZ I9OO MOTOR CAR, MI, AN EARLY TATTON ESTATE FIRE ENGINE,AEROPLANE ENGINE AND CINE CAMERA AND THE FAMILY STATE COACH LAST USED IN I9II AT THE CORONATION OF GEORGE V
